message.body: What is your availability on thurs the 10th? I am supposed to do an install in old city but am sick with stomach problems and can't get much further than my bed and the bathroom today. Hopefully I will be better by 9am on the 10th but I wanted to have a backup in place if I was unable to make it or needed assistance due to shitting my brains nonstop.
I'm free on the tenth, send me a text if you need a hand or something
Ok thanks man, hopefully I will feel better by then but it is a comfort to know there is a backup if I don't recover.
No problem, i hope you feel better. Did you see that insane game today?
No I didn't I was way to sick to do anything but walk to the bathroom
Sorry to hear that, it was the most insane game so far. Germany won 7-1
That made out effort against them look outstanding
I agree. To be honest the ridiculous game today was a good result for us haha
I think Brazils keeper has not looked good all tournament
He's just giant and kinda tubby and slow
None if the goals today were his fault, the defense was having a complete melt down
I guess hulk was not the superhero everyone thought he was
Its true
Not having neymar and silva was a big deal
Yeah, i would say they missed Silva the most. They were in total disarray in the back
If the Dutch somehow manage to win the World Cup I'm becoming a hockey fan
Haha
Robben will dive them all the way to the championship
The rules of the game are clearly flawed if a strategy like theirs can result in advancing this far in a major tournament
The ref just needs to put the hammer down on him
It's not just him tho
The rest of the team do it too but to a lesser extent
It will go away once they take it seriously as a problem
It's like finding a cheat in a video game that gives you infinite lives, it takes the whole reason for the games existence away.
You're right
Thanks man.
No problem
